titleStmt.title: Rules for hearing the Word of God with certain and saving benefit The second edition. By Daniel Burgess, minister of the gospel. Published by an hearer of them, at the request of many others.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Andrew Bell and Jonas Luntley, at the Pestle and Mortar, over against the Horseshoe-Tavern in Chancery-Lane,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Price three pence.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
Item incorrectly identified in reel guide as B5852A
